description: Erection of additional storey on rear projection, with railings to parapet to allow use of its roof as a roof terrace. Fitting of railings to roof of garden level rear extension to allow use as roof terrace.
decision_conditions: REASON: The erection of the additional storey on the rear projection constitutes development for which planning permission is granted by virtue of the terms of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 as amended by the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (Amendment) (No.2) (England) Order 2008. The fitting of railings constitutes an alteration to a roof for which planning permission is granted by virtue of the terms of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 as amended by the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (Amendment) (No.2) (England) Order 2008
